General.Name: Wacom Co. Ltd
General.Description: Wacom Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells electronic devices and related software worldwide. It provides input components and sensor systems to manufacturers of smartphones, tablets, and notebook PCs. The company also offers pen computers, such as MobileStudio Pro; pen displays, including Wacom One, Cintiq 13HD, Cintiq 22HD, Cintiq 22HD touch, Cintiq 27QHD, Cintiq 27QHD touch, Wacom Cintiq, and Wacom Cintiq Pro; pen tablets comprising Wacom Intuos, Wacom Intuos Pro, and Wacom Intuos Pro Paper; and smart pads consisting of Bamboo Slate and Bamboo Folio. In addition, it provides Bamboo Ink, Bamboo Ink Plus, Bamboo Sketch, Bamboo Solo, Bamboo Duo, Bamboo Fineline, and Bamboo Alpha styluses; and apps and services, such as Bamboo Paper, Inkspace, and Wacom Notes. Wacom Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Kazo, Japan.
